Subtopics: Higher order derivatives (successive differentiation) and Leibnitz theorem
Concavity and convexity of a curve
Maxima and minima of several variables
First order equation (separable, homogeneous, exact, linear, and Bernoulli’s form)
Second and higher order equation with constant coefficients
Wronskian’s system of first order equation
Convergence of improper integral - comparison test
Beta and gamma functions (definition and related problems)
Differentiation under integral sign - Leibnitz rule

Text Books: Advance engineering mathematics by H.K.Dass, S.Chand & Company Ltd.
Higher engineering mathematics by B.S. Grewal, Khanna Publishers
Differential calculus by Das & Mukherjee - U.N. Dhar & sons
Integral calculus by Das & Mukherjee - U.N. Dhar & sons
Reference Books: Advance engineering mathematics by E. Kreyszig, 8th Edition, John Wiley & Sons, New York
Advance engineering mathematics by Wiley & Barratt- Tata McGraw Hill
Linear Algebra by K. Hoffman and R Kunze-Prentice Hall
